paymentMethods.supportedPaymentFlows: <list of supported flows that can be performed with this payment method>
paymentMethods.type: <type of the payment method. For example: Credit Card>
paymentMethods.name: <[Optional] name of the payment method. For example: last 4 digits of credit card, obfuscated email>
paymentMethods.data: <[Optional] JSON data that will be returned to client>
